name: Flipper devices

rules.why: Respect is a 2 way street, sadly.
I have zero clue what they mean by that, however the 'discuss in private' part is scary because that way accountability cannot be enforced.
そうですね、突然誰かが日本語で話しているのを見たくありません。
Keeping conversations appropriate is ambiguous. Also 'relevant channel' what if there is no relevant channel or there are multiple?
The fact this is a zero tolerance rule already grants a severe tier. Sure, racism, trans and the relevant things are never good and the only reason this rule is not critical.
Barely got onto severe. Firstly, there is the option of the spam channel. Secondly, and the only reson this got severe, is 'any other content deemed inappropriate by our moderation team.'.
I'm not sure, but this seems fine, and i have no reason to reduce this.
They only said on illegal things, which i feel like is the only reason why i am not giving it a worse rating.
What if someone forgets to do it?
On top of reducing sales of your own product, what if the flipper goes out of stock and need a very specific link to get one?
Legality is a thing. The fact this includes trolling and pranks is extremely serious. On top of staff also mentioning 'inappropriate' things ambiguily.

summary: This server, intended to be a discussion for the popular product flipper zero, has quite a few rules that are quite strict, but in particular, the legality rule and how they sneak in harmless things like trolling make this server a very big red flag.

rules.text: Follow the Discord Guidelines and TOS
rules.why: Yeah if this rule is not there your server might be banned, so...

rules.text: Staff have the final say in all matters, do not argue with them. If you believe you are being treated unfairly, create a ticket.
